name: Wi-Fi Security Camera Footage
summary: Learn about .EPV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The SYMYNELEC Light Bulb outdoor security camera, Annke Crater 1080p indoor security camera, and some other Wi-Fi security cameras save footage to EPV files. Users can view the footage these files contain from within the camera's associated smartphone app, which is usually available for download from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
EPV files are not playable outside a camera's associated software. However, these apps typically provide a way to export an EPV file's contents as an .MP4 file, while watching the EPV file.

description: An EPV file is a video created by one of several models of Wi-Fi security cameras. It contains footage recorded by the camera. EPV files can be played only in a camera's associated software, which is typically a smartphone app.

instructions: You can open an EPV file in the smartphone app (or other software) associated with your Wi-Fi security camera. These apps include players that allow a user to access and play the EPV files stored on their camera(s).

Most likely, you can use the app associated with your Wi-Fi security camera to export an EPV file's contents as an MP4 (or other type of) video file. The exact instructions for how to do so vary from app to app. However, the export process typically involves playing an EPV file, pressing the Record button found in your app's EPV player, and then saving the recorded MP4 file to your smartphone.
